name: Certification version number of ARM software
Certification version number of DSP software
Daily Output Energy
note: Power generation of active output (including PV power generation and battery discharge)

name: Total Output Energy
note: Power generation of active output (including PV power generation and battery discharge)

name: A-B line voltage/phase A voltage
note: Refer to Output type (address: 5002) 0: phase voltage; 1: phase voltage; 2: line voltage

name: B-C line voltage/phase B voltage
note: Refer to Output type (address: 5002) 0: phase voltage; 1: phase voltage; 2: line voltage

name: C-A line voltage/phase voltage
note: Refer to Output type (address: 5002) 0: phase voltage; 1: phase voltage; 2: line voltage

name: Direct power consumption of today from PV
Daily direct energy consumption from PV
Monthly direct energy consumption from PV
Yearly direct energy consumption from PV
Daily battery charge energy from PV
Monthly battery charge energy from PV
Yearly battery charge energy from PV
Daily PV Generation
note: Electricity generated by the inverter through the PV module on the day

name: Total PV Generation
note: Total electricity generated by the inverter through the PV module

name: Daily export power from PV
note: Electricity delivered by the inverter to power grid through the PV module on the day

name: Total export energy from PV
note: Total electricity delivered by the inverter to power grid through the PV module

name: Export power
note: Power delivered by the inverter to power grid

name: Daily battery charge energy from PV
note: Electricity that the inverter charges the batteries through the PV module on the day

name: Total battery charge energy from PV
note: Total electricity that the inverter charges the batteries through the PV module

name: Daily direct energy consumption
note: Electricity taken from PV module by loads on the day

name: Total direct energy consumption
note: Accumulated electricity taken by the inverter from the PV module

name: Phase A current
note: Output type (address 5002) is 0: only phase A current is uploaded; 1 or 2: current of corresponding phases is uploaded

name: Battery Capacity
note: Li-ion:0.1kWh; Lead-acid: 1Ah Applicable types: SH5.0-10.0RT SH8.0-10RS

name: Daily export energy
note: Electricity delivered by the inverter to power grid through the PV module or batteries on the day

name: Total export energy
note: Accumulated electricity delivered by the inverter to power grid through the PV module or batteries

name: BMS protection
note: This part of data is the fault alarm information of the batteries used for the inverter. The communication address is the communication address of the if 5 batteries are connected, the communication

name: BMS fault 1
note: This part of data is the fault alarm information of the batteries used for the inverter. The communication address is the communication address of the if 5 batteries are connected, the communication

name: BMS fault 2
note: This part of data is the fault alarm information of the batteries used for the inverter. The communication address is the communication address of the if 5 batteries are connected, the communication

name: BMS alarm 2
note: This part of data is the fault alarm information of the batteries used for the inverter. The communication address is the communication address of the if 5 batteries are connected, the communication
